dmca.title: Regards legal proceedings on domain hosted on your servers: http://www.phpbb-mods.net
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
www.phpbb-mods.net/sutra4651.html#4651 any of the material that you
claim is being infringed as of 10:15:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

 

Legal Response Team

ThePlanet.com 

 


________________________________

From: Mark [mailto:markthedaemon@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 19, 2006 6:16 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Regards legal proceedings on domain hosted on your
servers: http://www.phpbb-mods.net
Subject: Regards legal proceedings on domain hosted on your servers:
http://www.phpbb-mods.net


Hello,

I am writing to inform you of a legal proceeding against a domain hosted
on your servers; http://www.phpbb-mods.net. There are numerous GPL
violations on this site, namely removing the copyright in phpBB (the
bulletin board) system's code, and i am sure that the copyright holders
of the code will proceed with legal action. I am writing to you to
inform you of slanderous and derogatory comments made against my person
on the site listed above. 

http://www.phpbb-mods.net/sutra4651.html#4651

The link i have provided above is the bulk of the slanderous and
insulting remarks made against my person. I'm sure you will agree such
comments as "another retard from phpbb.com joining the debate here" and
"MarkThehomo's" are totally unacceptable to have on any site.

As well as emailing to abuse@theplanet.com i am also emailing to
legal-responce@theplanet.com, as i will be taking this further via legal
action. I am well within my right to pursue the sites web host, and i'm
sure you realize this and thus we agree to a solution which makes all
parties happy. 

I look forward to hearing from you.


Mark Barnes
